Row.Text: I am King Guto. Fourteenth king of The Griffon Kingdoms. Please, take a seat and make your self at home. What can I do for you? An offer perhaps?
Take my land, but DO NOT take my gold!
Curse you! I knew you where after my gold!
Fine, take it. TAKE IT ALL! Show everyone who's the real monster possessed by greed.
I heard you got something of value. Could you perhaps give it to me? It would make me way more rich... Uh, I mean, help my subjects.
Don't take it personal, its all business. And you are weak. That means easy money for me.
Your empire is almost as bad as that spontaneous musical singing ponies do... Horrible, just horrible. Prepare for war!
I'm tired of you. Your offers weren't profitable enough anyway. So here is a offer that will do to my expectations. You hand over all your cities, and get lost.
Haha, you're always a funny one, are you?... Wait, you mean it? HOW DARE YOU! Your betrayal will be punished. Justice will be mine!
I saw this coming, and I'm prepared. We are about to have a really good time you and I. And with we, I mean ME. Enough talking, let's get started.
Do you think I'm scared? HA! I am ready for whatever you throw at me. May the strongest civilization survive.
My traders wish to enter your lands. Lets me a deal, shall we?
Your making new cities around us. Stop doing that! If I can't expand, that would mean I can't claim new grounds. And that would also mean I can't mine more gold... Am I clear?
I have a offer, Specially for you. I just know it will be of your interest
What are you doing?... You are after my gold, are you?
2147. 2148. 2149... Oh, greetings! I was busy counting my bits. Could you hold up for just a moment? Thanks! So, where was I... 2132? No, I was at... 2054?... Darn it! Fine, what do you need?
Ahh, gold!... I mean, friend! Lets get to business.
I would give up all my gold just to see you disintegrate. What do you want from me?
There is only one thing that would bring me more joy than gold... Your downfall.
I was told by others that your empire is easy to take in. I must say that it's very tempting.
Your lands would be an excellent edition to my kingdom. Can't wait to make it reality.
I win, of course. The highest bidder always does.
You may have won this war, but we're not done yet...
With allot of pain, I accept.
No, there is just no way. Think of all the wasted gold.
Just take it, turn around, and NEVER come back!...
I'd rather have my feathers picked.
See this as a gift. One great leader to another.
What, are you crazy?!... No, sorry... Uhh... May try to make it more appealing?
Got any bits?
Time to pay your toll.
Lets try to forget out past for a moment. What do you think of this?
A paper cut to the eyeball. That's how painful your offer is.
